name: TwinBee RPG
description: TwinBee RPG (ツインビーRPG, fully titled TwinBee Role Playing Game on the game's packaging) is a role-playing video game for the PlayStation released exclusively in Japan on April 2, 1998 (with re-released for the Konami the Best on December 1999 and the PSOne Book on November 2003). It is a spin-off of the TwinBee shoot-'em-up series featuring a storyline based on the TwinBee Paradise audio drama serial.
